Description:
On an island you find a wooden altar that seems to be a replica of other similar altars. It does not seem to be very powerful - or fully functional.

After inspecting it a little more, you see that next to it there is a small platform with a pyre underneath, which you imagine is used to make sacrifices to empower the altar. 

While you are inspecting the altar you hear vague murmurings that seem to come from nowhere and everywhere at once, just like you did at the previous altar.
DescriptionAction: You feel the urge to place the Whispering Stone upon the altar.

    "ReplyText": "Listen to the murmurings and place the stone on the altar.",
    "SSRewardText": "You are just pulling the stone from your backpack when the altar suddenly catches aflame, brimming brightly and burning with power. Feeling ill-at-ease, you throw the Whispering Stone into the flames and watch as they turn black, then slowly fade.\n\nYou cautiously touch the Whispering Stone and discover that it is ice cold, despite the flames that surrounded it just seconds ago, and feels even more ominous than it did after the previous altar.",
